1.12.2.0.1.0:
Commit message of the century: Fixed a number of issues and added a whole bunch of little things:
 - Better shift-click integration for various GUIs
 - Forgeable item heat tooltips (workable, weldable, danger)
 - Anvil tooltips, GUI cleanup, rendering, and bugfixes
 - Migrated knapping packet to PacketGuiButton
 - Firepit bellows integration
 - Fixes involving incorrectly specified metal tiers / missing tiers.
 - IFireable cleanup involving tiers
And lots of javadoc comments everywhere
